Question.Subject: I just created a streaming radio station online, is there any site or any way I can advertise it to get listen?
Question.Content: I have created a radio station. I will play mostly electronic and hip hop music, and it will not be functional 24/7. Is there any place I can advertise it for free? or any kind of listing I can put up for it? Hmm twitter and facebook seem like a no-no most of my friends don't like electronic music.
Question.ChosenAnswer:
This is an online classifieds site that I use:
http://www.backpage.com/59841052
It is similar to Craigslist and in many cases, BETTER. Good Luck.

Answer.Content: try promoting it through twitter and facebook if people like it they will spread the word... nominated for stumbleupon too...

This is an online classifieds site that I use:
http://www.backpage.com/59841052
It is similar to Craigslist and in many cases, BETTER. Good Luck.
